# Repairable Weapons List (Vanilla)

## Overview

This document lists all weapons that have repair definitions in vanilla Project Zomboid's `fixing.txt`.

## Axes

| Weapon | Fixers | Skill Required |
|--------|--------|----------------|
| Axe | Woodglue, DuctTape, Glue, Scotchtape | Woodwork 2 (Woodglue) |
| HandAxe | Woodglue, DuctTape, Glue, Scotchtape | Woodwork 2 (Woodglue) |
| WoodAxe | Woodglue, DuctTape, Glue, Scotchtape | Woodwork 2 (Woodglue) |
| PickAxe | Woodglue, DuctTape, Glue, Scotchtape | Woodwork 2 (Woodglue) |
| HandScythe | Woodglue, DuctTape, Glue, Scotchtape | Woodwork 2 (Woodglue) |

- Metal Bar
- Plunger
- Most improvised weapons
